data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in San Marcos who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Marcos, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of San Marcos, Guatemala will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

data.section_summary: On average, 24 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in San Marcos, Guatemala.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Lord, to the people of San Marcos you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in San Marcos, Guatemala, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in San Marcos, Guatemala a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, help the 158,731 believers in San Marcos to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of San Marcos prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
